website_summaries.verdict: Although they won't work for everyone, this pair is worth considering if you want two classic pillows for one budget-friendly price.
pros: Filled with fibres that provide sleep-promoting comfort
cons: Pillows have the tendency to flatten out over time, and may be too soft for those who prefer firm support

customer_reviews.title: Quality at a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time debating which pillow to go for but eventually I settled on these. Comfy pillows, and haven't lost their shape yet! Without doubt I feel they give more support (no more neckaches) and also they don't get feathers everywhere! Bought these for £18, which I think is a fair price. Would recommend. If you found this review helpful, I would appreciate a thumbs up:)
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Not equally plump
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to receiving two plump pillows as my current ones were looking a bit flat. After looking through various reviews I decided to go for these ones as the reviews seemed promising. The first pillow I took out was nice and plump and fitted snug in my pillow case. However the second one I took out was a bit more flat and didn't feel as filled so when it's in the pillow case it's a bit limp looking. I thought both pillows would be nice and plump so am a bit disappointed that the quality of the pillows are not consistent.
customer_reviews.author: M. G. Tan

customer_reviews.title: The perfect pillow
customer_reviews.text: The last pillow I had, I cherished fondly for 13 years until it sadly fell apart in the wash, I never thought I'd find another pillow I would love as much, this pillow is the one. It is blissfully soft to the touch and to lie on, whilst being thick enough to give support. It is incredible quality and I am thouroughly delighted. I didn't think I could love again, this pillow reignited my heart.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Is not Medium Firm..
customer_reviews.text: I would give give 5 stars if advertised as soft. I am not sure if the manufacturer tested this pillow with a human's head weight or more likely it was a pigeon's. IT'S Soft and you sink. Petty though the quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Reducto

customer_reviews.title: Poor product. Lasted less than 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Yet another poor pillow that is advertised as being something it is not. My 1st one lasted 2 weeks before it flopped. I had made do with it and am now onto the 2nd one which again won't last. I won't buy again. My hunt for decent pillows continues. I think you pay for what you get with pillows!
customer_reviews.author: B. Dash

customer_reviews.title: If you want a soft pillow its a winner, i didn't wantit to be so soft.
customer_reviews.text: should be fresh air collection not hotel collection, they are way too soft for my liking. they will be flat within weeks I guarantee it. I cannot recommend for me but if you want a good quality very soft pillow then this is maybe what you are looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Doncaster

customer_reviews.title: Great quality & worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Super soft, plump & luxurious. Had them 4 months & they have been great. They're getting a little flat now but that's more down to my preference & my heavy head squashing them though. I've put them through the washer & they came out looking like new so they wash well too. Could be good for another 2/3 months but about to buy another 4 bc i love how comfortable they are when they're brand new.
customer_reviews.author: jade westmoreland

customer_reviews.title: so comfy and fresh
customer_reviews.text: i loved product when eventually recieved from hermes 5 days later and was on next day delivery app the parcel was too big to deliver so was kept at depot for 5 days hermes didnt even answer 4 emails i sent so be careful customer on delivery
customer_reviews.author: miss diane edney

customer_reviews.title: Pilow  dirty with stains
customer_reviews.text: Product was dirty with stains and looked used on one of the pillows
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting sending me used pillows
customer_reviews.text: 2 x apparently new pillows as you can see clearly been used for some time, disgusting!
customer_reviews.author: avril

customer_reviews.title: No idea why I read some bad reviews these are amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and beautifully soft & plump, they came a day late but due to the snow we have been having, i wasn't bothered. when you get the pillows out of the packaging make sure to give them a good fluff up! They are 'fraying' a little bit but nothing a lighter can't seal together. If you are going to wash them I'd advise once out of the washing machine to place them in the airing cuboid and turn heating on high.
customer_reviews.author: Mollie-Jane & Daisy-May

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not sure what hotel you'd get these
customer_reviews.text: Nice and comfortable, but doesn't in my mind meet the description and could be a bit misleading. Hotel collection...not sure that i have ever came across these in a hotel, as i think i'd remember. Very plump but also not very dense, you definitely sink to the bottom of these pillows
customer_reviews.author: James Mckay

customer_reviews.title: NOT Hotel quality!
customer_reviews.text: Appalling quality pillows. Akin to Asda Smart price quality rather than the hotel quality promised! Came with stuffing not even full to corners, so just empty flaps of fabric (which is also very low quality!) & went flat in less than 1 month & had to be replaced. I replaced them with (much cheaper) pillows from M&S, which we are still using now! Would not recommend these to an enemy!
customer_reviews.author: SuziB

customer_reviews.title: Went As Flat As A Fart In 2 Month
customer_reviews.text: I brought 2 x packs of these, and all four went as flat as anything after less than 2 month. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Barrie

customer_reviews.title: Feels great... until it doesn’t anymore
customer_reviews.text: I bought these pillows in December, I was very happy at first because they were very comfortable, it was like sleeping on a cloud! I had no problems at all for a few months until the pillows stopped being puffy and became instead this flat hard thing that made it impossible to have a comfortable night sleep. So now I’m here, 7 months later with a pillow that not only doesn’t support my head anymore, but it’s hard as a rock and causes me neck and shoulder pain. Definitely would not recommend, unless you want to buy them every 6 months then go for it.
customer_reviews.author: wuthering_h

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended - poor quality and filling does not fill every corner!
customer_reviews.text: disappointed with these and would not recommend or buy again. Filling is uncomfortable PLUS not every corner in each pillow had filling in it!! waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: lasted 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for a pillow that will last a good length of time before they go lumpy and flat. These lasted around 6 months before this happened. I fluff and puff them up most nights but still I'm having to replace them already. Won't be buying them again or recommending.
customer_reviews.author: Mr G.

customer_reviews.title: A really nice pair of pillows
customer_reviews.text: I spent ages looking for pillows! I looked at expensive goose and duck pillows as well. I got sooo confused trying to decide wether to spend more money to get the right comfort. In the end I went for these! I’ve had them a few weeks now and they are lovely and comfy. They haven’t gone flat! I’ve plumped them up a couple of times but they really are nice pillows. I also find they don’t make my head hot either!
customer_reviews.author: angie

customer_reviews.title: Not Luxury 5star
customer_reviews.text: Luxury these are not! They look big an puffy but when you put your head on the pillow it hits the mattress like the pillow isn't there.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Will Sink Especially After A Few Months, Not Really As "Firm" As The Photos Suggest
customer_reviews.text: So if you're looking at the 3rd and 4th product photos and thinking "Wow, they look nice and firm, I wonder if they'll stay like that", the answer is no. In fact mine never looked anywhere near as plump and firm as them, I would describe mine as soft and after a few months you will definitely notice you have to plump them up often. Not really what I expected. On the basis of the expectations the photos gave I have to give this 2 stars. If you're looking for firm pillows for neck, head or back support I would recommend looking for another product.
customer_reviews.author: TheDirectorsOfGaming

customer_reviews.title: Good price and comfortable, soft.
customer_reviews.text: I got these initially for a guest bed but was so surprised at how fluffy, soft, comfortable they are that there now on my own bed. Unfortunately I now still need to get pillows for the guest bed so I’ll be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Ian T

customer_reviews.title: Soft as a baby elephants cock
customer_reviews.text: If you want to feel no support at all and want to think you are sleeping in a elephant safari where they except you into their trip and think you dont enjoy decent lumbar support during a decent 12hour sleep. This would be perfect
customer_reviews.author: matt maugey

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely misleading firmness rating. If they class this as medium firmness I hate to think what soft is classed as. Great quality product but super soft pillow that will inevitably compress very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL BURKE

customer_reviews.title: Soft sink in pillows with comfort
customer_reviews.text: Soft sink in pillows with comfort. If you want more support use both. They really are like the ones in good hotels. If you want soft and comfort and don't mind using two if you want more support for side sleeping, you found the ideal product here.
customer_reviews.author: Antonakis

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: these pillows are great. Bought them for the guest room but the wife nicked them so now they live in our room.....good call as it turns out but I'll not tell her that as she'll use it against me always forever.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Finn

customer_reviews.title: A perfect pair of pillows
customer_reviews.text: These pillows ate the best I've ever had. They're brilliant quality, a pleasure to use, so comfortable and astonishing value for money. They, to me, should be more expensive. If I ever need any more, I know where to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kaz

customer_reviews.title: great product  on the face of it
customer_reviews.text: Value for money? Only time will tell! Come on Amazon. for products of this nature, give your buyers a lot more time, before asking for reviews. Perhaps this is why I often don't give them there is no point in requsting honest comments before time in given to truly review a product
customer_reviews.author: keith

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I have spent a fortune on Pillows,Side Sleeper,Memory Foam,Bounce Back,Mandarin you name it, I have tried it,This is the BEST ever,I had my 1st full nights sleep,in a long time,no more waking up,punching the pillow,turning the pillow over,It was like sleeping on a Cloud,Highly recommend,great price.
customer_reviews.author: wingflapper

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing pillows. I'm really difficult when it comes to finding pillows I like. Had these for over a month now and they're still as good as new. I've bought ones from Dunelm for 3x the price before and these just blow them out of the water. Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Jo & Andy

customer_reviews.title: Really nice steady pillows
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as i needed more steady pillows as i always have neck pain with softer pillows and so far they have been really nice and my neck doesn't hurt in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Phani

customer_reviews.title: Great support for the neck.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a side sleeper and like to sleep with one arm under the pillow. Sleeping this way I used to get cramp in my arm which often woke me up. Not with these pillows. Slept all night without a twinge. A great buy but just what one expects from this manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable as expected
customer_reviews.text: Although advertised as Hotel pillows, they were not the Hotel pillows I had experienced before. There are some Hotel pillows by trade name and some that hint that they are the type of pillows that hotels use. This is very misleading. I am very disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: ifd

customer_reviews.title: Not great at all
customer_reviews.text: Not overly happy with these pillows. Extremely uneven in parts which is annoying. Despite their appearance they are quite flat pillows which can cause headaches when using a more firm memory foam mattress like myself. Wouldn’t recommend unless you are very price sensitive and if so they should do the job nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: Bought two sets of these pillows as the reviews seemed really great. The pillows are too soft for me and the material covering them is really thin, not really ‘hotel quality’ if I’m honest. I’ve washed one pillow as instructed and have tried to plump it back to its original shape as best as I could but it has a lump on one side. I don’t think I’ll be buying anymore of these pillows as there are better ones for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plump but soft a great pillow.
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews and expected to be disappointed. There were a few issues with late delivery and parcel being diverted but the seller kept me well informed all along and very apologetic so I had no worries that they would arrive. Plump but soft, not an easy feat in itself, and I only need one pillow now with these, and had best nights sleep last night so very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and soft pillows
customer_reviews.text: Good quality pillows - exactly what was looking for. Used them in a combination with a Silentnight Hotel Collection Duvet for a refreshing, comfortable sleep. Happy with the purchase and would buy it again in future.
customer_reviews.author: N Ivanova

customer_reviews.title: Flatten very quickly
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in them, they lose shape very quickly, and they go flat, I've had to purchase new pillows already as they are not firm enough
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Nice and soft
customer_reviews.text: Although they don't provide loads of support they are super comfortable and really soft, having had them for a month or so they have kept the same quality as when purchased. Nice feeling of luxury at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Cris Cook

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: A really good quality pillow at a quality price really well packed and very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: John thys

customer_reviews.title: Superb great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 3 sets of these pillows 2 for family 1 as a gift for someone else they all love them - great value superb bouncy pillows that are like sleeping on a cloud - a must have for a good nights sleep
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice pillow but I wouldn’t call it hotel pillow. It’s ok, very soft and doesn’t support my head/neck properly. I don’t think it will last long. Value for money is good if you need a new pillow
customer_reviews.author: R. Parmar

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I like the silky touch of the pillow cases! while one thing makes me a little bit disappointed that the thickness of the pillows was ideal at the beginning, however, they have gone a little flat in two weeks. I have to make they plump again, it is still ok on this price.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these as they are not hotel quality!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 and all 4 will be going back. These are never hotel pillows. Sub-Standard filling which doesn’t even fully the corners. Plus I think these are seconds as the labels are ripped off. Wasted my time.
customer_reviews.author: C Cairns

customer_reviews.title: Bouncy and soft
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is very fluffy and I have not had it long. It doesn’t look Like it will keep it’s shape in the long term but currently it is working well for me. Soft and bouncy as well as sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Sajida

customer_reviews.title: Was hoping for more
customer_reviews.text: They feel nice but within a couple of weeks they were flat as pancakes. I paid the extra hoping for good quality but I could have got mostly the same just grabbing the pillows from a supermarket.
customer_reviews.author: Emma, Mark and Vida

customer_reviews.title: Soft pillows
customer_reviews.text: These are very soft and I needed a few firmer pillows underneath but I do like the variety. I don’t think I could sleep on these alone as it would feel like air. My pillow protector helps give it shape though.
customer_reviews.author: Tshelane Reid

customer_reviews.title: To sleep, perchance to dream.
customer_reviews.text: Really good set of pillows, very comfy, retain their shape well. Definitely getting a descents night sleep with them. Well worth the price, biught kn the recommendation of other friends who have them. Will buy again after having used them now
customer_reviews.author: Trigger09

customer_reviews.title: Absolute First Class
customer_reviews.text: I cannot recommend these enough, absolutely great quality. We normally use two pillows each so we bought 4 in total (2 packs of 2), however we found we only needed to use one, so now we have 2 spare :).
customer_reviews.author: Gary C

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed with these pillows. I was really looking forward swapping my old pillows for this pair after reading all the comments in here but unfortunately it’s one big disappointment. The pillows look nice but they are not firm at all, after putting my head on the pillow I feel like my head is almost touching the mattress. It’s just such a waste of money because I could get same quality pillows for half pf this price.
customer_reviews.author: Ewa

customer_reviews.title: Cosey.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality pillows, States that they are washing machine friendly. (They are nothing of the sort) hence the poor rating. I would highly recommend if you purchase these, buy yourself some pillow protectors. Other than that, really great and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and squidgy
customer_reviews.text: Lovely soft and comfortable pillows with good quality material. Although it is definitely softer than 'medium' firmness. Nevertheless I've been sleeping like a baby! Just need to get a firmer under pillow to support my neck better
customer_reviews.author: Simone Rew

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased these I expected good quality and comfort that would last a while. I'm a disabled who needs this. The pillows were none of these.
customer_reviews.author: Karin P

customer_reviews.title: Dreadful Neck-Aches..!!!
customer_reviews.text: Initially very excited seeing that these pillows are supposedly “Hotel Collection”, but was very disappointed the minute I received them as I’ve unfortunately been suffering with dreadful neck-aches ever since using these pillows. I cannot recall a time when I’ve stayed at a hotel for then to wake up with a stiff-neck the very next morning. Really not impressed with this purchase and certainly wouldn’t recommend it..!!! Could I please get my money back..??!!
customer_reviews.author: John Mpele

customer_reviews.title: Flattened really quickly
customer_reviews.text: They were amazingly soft and fluffy at first but flattened within two weeks of use. I have had to buy other pillows instead.
customer_reviews.author: Hattie C

customer_reviews.title: Best pillow ever!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pillow. I generally sleep on my front so need a soft pillow to avoid neck ache in the morning. I have tried many pillows before that have been more expensive however these are awesome. 100% recommend if you love soft pillows to sink into.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron H

customer_reviews.title: A decent nights sleep at last.
customer_reviews.text: They arrived quickly, were well wrapped and in perfect condition. I am having the best nights sleep in quite a while, they are soft but with a great amount of support for my head and neck. I woke up feeling so rested. Will definitely be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Bettys boy

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: First couple of days these pillows were really comfortable but by day 3 or 4 they were flat and I had to go out and buy more because I was starting to neck neck and shoulder pain. Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dania

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pillows! Exactly like hotel ones.
customer_reviews.text: Pillows came super voluminous. After reading some of the reviews of people getting dirty pillows and things, I was a bit unsure. However, I can confirm they come completely brand new and have no stains or loose threads. The pillows once taken out of packaging and puffed out a bit are so big and exactly like the hotel pillows I’ve been wanting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Soft cheap quality pillows. Gave a terrible pain in neck and shoulder
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pillows for a sound sleep
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic pillows. Full, plumb and look great on the bed but not too dense/hard or too soft, that it hurts your neck. Just the right support - as Goldilocks would say! Recommend these high quality pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go flat very quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Held of writing the review to give them a full test. Had them about 2 months now I think and they are flat. And went flat very quickly. For the money they were I suppose it's a what you get thing. They were very comfortable for a couple of weeks but now, no amounting of fluffing gets them through the night.
customer_reviews.author: James Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Fab pillows
customer_reviews.text: These are a medium firmness, however, I found them a little soft - this could be personal reference though. Good quality, nice smell, clean and nice patterned cover to them.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Like clouds
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! Although I’m having to move them around in the cases as they are slightly to small for the very puffy pillows. The pillows are lovely and plump up very well. I just need bigger cases.
customer_reviews.author: JoJoStar

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I have these in my room and bought a second set but they were not as advertised. Product had different cover and filling to ones I bought from a shop.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria W.

customer_reviews.title: Good... if you replace your pillows every other month
customer_reviews.text: I've had these pillows for almost 6 months and been toying with replacing them for the past 3 months! I have to cake now though as they now feel as though I'm resting my head on a rock. They were lovely for the first 2 months and very quickly got worse and worse.
customer_reviews.author: Gemma

customer_reviews.title: Pillow that really lets you fall into bed
customer_reviews.text: Although the pillows are extremely soft, I've found that they collapse so easily much I need to use 2 for bed. Although this may be my own opinion and some people prefer soft bedding
customer_reviews.author: Wai L.

customer_reviews.title: average pillows. This will probably last less than 1 year
customer_reviews.text: very average pillows. Luckily I use then for my bottom set and have memory foam pillows on the top. Would not recommend these as your main pillows.
customer_reviews.author: lee

customer_reviews.title: Simply great
customer_reviews.text: A good, comfortable, pillow at an affordable price. It is medium soft and standard size; which would suit most people. Simply great for a good night's sleep.
customer_reviews.author: D. Whiting

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to receiving these pillows but I have to say I’m hugely disappointed. They were so comfy for the first couple of nights and slowly started becoming thinner and thinner. I would expect this over time but within a month isn’t what I was expecting. Definitely wouldn’t buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't say Hotel pillows
customer_reviews.text: Too soft, ya head literally touches the bed when it's on the 2 of them x
customer_reviews.author: missgj

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping on a cloud!
customer_reviews.text: They plump up nicely once removed from the packaging and are super soft! Like sleeping on a fluffy cloud. They still offer a decent amount of support though. Will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Chan

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I struggled to find pillows that keep their shape but are not expensive. These were a great price and are super comfortable. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft but not the best pillows.
customer_reviews.text: Although the pillows are soft, they are not the best pillows. Memory foam pillows are much more comfortable. I would not recommend these pillows.
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo Disappointed :(
customer_reviews.text: I'd just purchased a new mattress, so wanted some new bedding. and after a lot of research and reading the reviews I choose and waited as they have been out of stock, good sign. I purchased the Hotel Collection. They arrived well within the estimated time, brilliant. After one uncomfortable, un-supported night sleep, I reverted back to my pillows. the hunt goes on for the perrrrrrrfect one
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Not a 4 firm but still comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great pillows, nice and light and fluffy, but didnt have that density most hotel pillows do when you sink into them. As theyre not as 'firm' or stiff you do sink into them a little but a good amount so still sleep comfortably. I lie on my side a lot and its difficult as it doesnt sit under the shoulder well, tends to push up instead and rest above my collar bone, but thats the only reason for 4 stars not 5!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable sleep
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable pillows which have helped me get a better night's sleep. No strange smells, lumpy bits, free of dust and keeping their shape.
customer_reviews.author: Wesleyan

customer_reviews.title: Soon go our of shape and lumpy
customer_reviews.text: Thought these were great for the first 4 weeks. Soon go out of shape. Don't wash well -go lumpy
customer_reviews.author: Sue Graham

customer_reviews.title: Flattened within a few months
customer_reviews.text: These pillows were good to begin with but they flattened out very quickly. Within a few months me and my partner started getting aches in our neck and had the most rubbish sleep. Pillows should not last such little time before they just become put uncomfortable. Better off investing in something that will last a while longer.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great Pillows!
customer_reviews.text: These are probably the best pillows I've ever bought from Silentnight, they're beautifully soft and bouncy.
customer_reviews.author: C. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Bounce back pillows
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for some pillows that bounce back and these do that. I have only had them on my bed for about 2 weeks but they seem to keep bouncing back, so so far so good! Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ssshhhhhh I’m sleeping
customer_reviews.text: Had these pillows for a week or so and they are still very plump. Fingers crossed they stay that way so for now I think they are fab value for money and softness.
customer_reviews.author: lynsey

customer_reviews.title: Has nothing to do with any Hotel quality !
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst thing I bought it from Amazon, the description is not right, this quality has nothing to do with hotel !! I have read many bad review but I thought Amazon won't let a company use this platform to lie to their customers ! I tried it the first night and woke up with my neck in pain ! and that was the reason I stopped my prime membership ! I am so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nabil Amenchar

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product rubbish delivery
customer_reviews.text: The product is fantastic, crap delivery tho very late at Saturday on 8pm and then it was the next day at Sunday 1pm with a neighbour. Rubbish delivery.
customer_reviews.author: R. C. Parkin

customer_reviews.title: Nice at first
customer_reviews.text: Not that good after a while they loose their shape deffinatly would not dare wash them they would ruin totaly
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Davies

customer_reviews.title: recommend
customer_reviews.text: was abit worried after seen some other reviews on this item and was not sure but due to lockdown i had to bite the bullet! They are good pillows and do keep there shape and arrived clean and not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: nicola

customer_reviews.title: but if you like them soft you'll like these
customer_reviews.text: Little bit soft for me, but if you like them soft you'll like these.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: From Fluffy to Flat (be prepared) 😂😂😂👇🏻
customer_reviews.text: Luxury hotel pillows hey? Very funny. They're flat, completely flat now after not more than 2 or 3 months. Not worth it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Abdellatif Lalmi

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I think it's good value for money. However I was hoping it had more filling inside the pillow. I tend to sleep on two pillows now instead
customer_reviews.author: Ali Abdar

customer_reviews.title: Flat after a month
customer_reviews.text: The pillows are great to start with but they beclme flat very fast, has ours for just over a month and they are gone as flat as the pillows we swapped out in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Dan G

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I have worked in the hotel industry and this quality of pillow would not be accepted. But they are okay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable pillows. Not too soft or firm. Ideal the a very restless sleeper who back and side sleeps. Very happy with these and no neck strain in the morning
customer_reviews.author: EJ Mead

customer_reviews.title: It's  a BUY from me.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, did not smell for me, durable, cool and soft, everything you need in a pillow for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonbeast

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I held off on leaving a review as wanted to see how they would go and it's so far so good. Seem to have held up well so far, not had the issues others have reported
customer_reviews.author: Jamesc

customer_reviews.title: Luxury Pillows
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, comfortable, bounce back, little pricey though, but still like them and may buy again....
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Berridge

customer_reviews.title: Most definitely comfortable pillows.
customer_reviews.text: Needed new pillows, I am so glad I chose these ones. For comfort, softness and good value the best I have bought.
customer_reviews.author: Moira

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in poor condition
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 x pillows and received 4. They were all unusable as they were all marked and stained as if they had been in damp storage for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S

customer_reviews.title: Bit of a disappointment really I wouldn’t be happy going to a hotel and sleeping on these
customer_reviews.text: It was okay but don’t think it was worth 5 pounds for each pillow seen better in High Street stores
customer_reviews.author: a Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Excellent what a great buy. This is another vendor I would certainly use over and over again
customer_reviews.author: Lady - Preston

customer_reviews.title: Very soft
customer_reviews.text: I did get these on sale they are a great bargain and they are nice pillows and to be fair they are like hotel pillows but I just find them a little soft but thinking about it I should have expected that as hotel pillows are very often very soft
customer_reviews.author: Mr Gareth Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy these
customer_reviews.text: Someone said in reveiws these are fake I laughed I can now confirm these pillows are definitely not silent night they are cheap and uncomfortable not even a half decent rip off
customer_reviews.author: Davedave
